response.overview: The Bride unwaveringly continues on her roaring rampage of revenge against the band of assassins who had tried to kill her and her unborn child. She visits each of her former associates one-by-one, checking off the victims on her Death List Five until there's nothing left to do … but kill Bill.
response.tagline: The bride is back for the final cut.
response.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2

titles.title: Kill Bill, la venganza: Volumen II
นางฟ้าซามูไร 2

cast.name: Uma Thurman
cast.character: Beatrix Kiddo / The Bride / 'Black Mamba' / Mommy
